extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_PartPlantSearch;
extern alias Erp_Contracts_BO_Part;


using System;
using System.ComponentModel;

//eb2:

public class Script
{
	// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do Not Remove 'Begin/End Wizard Added Module Level Variables' Comments! **
	// Begin Wizard Added Module Level Variables **

	// End Wizard Added Module Level Variables **

	// Add Custom Module Level Variables Here **

	EpiUltraGrid grdList;
	private BOReaderImpl _boReader;

	//eb2:
	Dictionary<int, string> dictOrders = new Dictionary<int, string>();
	Dictionary<string, string> dictJobs = new Dictionary<string, string>();
	Dictionary<int, string> dictPurchaseOrders = new Dictionary<int, string>();
	DataTable dtSalesOrder;
	DataTable dtPO;
	DataTable dtJob;



	public void InitializeCustomCode()
	{
		// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Variable Initialization' lines **
		// Begin Wizard Added Variable Initialization

		// End Wizard Added Variable Initialization

		// Begin Wizard Added Custom Method Calls

		// End Wizard Added Custom Method Calls

		grdList = (EpiUltraGrid)csm.GetNativeControlReference("7908565c-cc3c-43d1-b85b-9921ad88fb89");

		grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns.Add("RowUpdated");
		grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns["RowUpdated"].Hidden = true;

		grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns.Add("PartNum2" ,"Parent Item");
		grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns["PartNum2"].CellActivation = Activation.ActivateOnly;
		grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns["PartNum2"].Header.VisiblePosition = 18;

		grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns.Add("CustomerName" ,"Cust Name");
		grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns["CustomerName"].CellActivation = Activation.ActivateOnly;
		grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns["CustomerName"].Header.VisiblePosition = 24; 

		grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns.Add("VendorName" ,"Supplier Name");
		grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns["VendorName"].CellActivation = Activation.ActivateOnly;
		grdList.DisplayLayout.Bands[0].Columns["VendorName"].Header.VisiblePosition = 26;

		grdList.InitializeRow += new InitializeRowEventHandler(this.ugTransactions_InitializeRow);
	    _boReader = WCFServiceSupport.CreateImpl<BOReaderImpl>(oTrans.CoreSession, BOReaderImpl.UriPath);

	}

	public void DestroyCustomCode()
	{
		// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Object Disposal' lines **
		// Begin Wizard Added Object Disposal

		// End Wizard Added Object Disposal

		// Begin Custom Code Disposal

		// End Custom Code Disposal

		grdList.InitializeRow -= new InitializeRowEventHandler(this.ugTransactions_InitializeRow);
		_boReader = null;

	}


	private void TimePhasForm_Load(object sender, EventArgs args)
	{
		//eb2:
		//Control c1 = csm.GetNativeControlReference("cdf4e0c8-4643-4c8b-9aaf-a53c47ce9985");
		//EpiCheckBox chkSuggestions = (EpiCheckBox)c1;
		//chkSuggestions.Checked = false;

		Control c2 = csm.GetNativeControlReference("7ceb719a-f574-4989-bf03-18263d5719f4");
		EpiCheckBox chkTOSuggestions = (EpiCheckBox)c2;
		chkTOSuggestions.Checked = false;

		Control c3 = csm.GetNativeControlReference("7f8e2894-a0c1-4ce6-a392-7bd7fc1faba0");
		EpiCheckBox chkPlanContractInfo = (EpiCheckBox)c3;
		chkPlanContractInfo.Checked = false;

	}

	private void ugTransactions_InitializeRow(object sender, InitializeRowEventArgs e)
	{

		if((string)e.Row.Cells["RowUpdated"].Value != "YES")
		{
			//eb2: try/catch moved to within each chunk of code
			//try
			//{

			if((int)e.Row.Cells["OrderNum"].Value != 0)
			{
				//MessageBox.Show("OrderNum: " + ((int)e.Row.Cells["OrderNum"].Value).ToString());

				//eb2:
				/*
				e.Row.Cells["CustomerName"].Value = "error";
				DataTable dtSalesOrder = _boReader.GetList("Erp:BO:SalesOrder","OrderNum = " + (int)e.Row.Cells["OrderNum"].Value + "","OrderNum,CustomerName").Tables[0];
				if(dtSalesOrder.Rows.Count > 0 )
				{
					e.Row.Cells["CustomerName"].Value = dtSalesOrder.Rows[0]["CustomerName"];
				}
				*/
				try 
				{
					int intOrderNum = (int)e.Row.Cells["OrderNum"].Value;
					if (!dictOrders.ContainsKey(intOrderNum))
					{
						dtSalesOrder = _boReader.GetList("Erp:BO:SalesOrder","OrderNum = " + intOrderNum + "","OrderNum,CustomerName").Tables[0];
						if(dtSalesOrder.Rows.Count > 0 )
						{
							e.Row.Cells["CustomerName"].Value = dtSalesOrder.Rows[0]["CustomerName"];
						}
						dictOrders.Add(intOrderNum, (string)dtSalesOrder.Rows[0]["CustomerName"]);
					}
					else
					{
						e.Row.Cells["CustomerName"].Value = dictOrders[intOrderNum];
					
					}
				}
				catch
				{
					e.Row.Cells["CustomerName"].Value = "error";
				}


			}

			if((int)e.Row.Cells["PONum"].Value != 0)
			{
				//MessageBox.Show("PONum: " + ((int)e.Row.Cells["PONum"].Value).ToString());
				//eb2:
				/*
				e.Row.Cells["VendorName"].Value = "error";
				DataTable dtPO = _boReader.GetList("Erp:BO:PO","PONum = " + (int)e.Row.Cells["PONum"].Value + "","PONum,VendorName").Tables[0];
				if(dtPO.Rows.Count > 0 )
				{
					e.Row.Cells["VendorName"].Value = dtPO.Rows[0]["VendorName"];
				}
				*/
				try 
				{
					int intJobNum = (int)e.Row.Cells["PONum"].Value;
					if (!dictPurchaseOrders.ContainsKey(intJobNum))
					{
						dtPO = _boReader.GetList("Erp:BO:PO","PONum = " + intJobNum + "","PONum,VendorName").Tables[0];
						if(dtPO.Rows.Count > 0 )
						{
							e.Row.Cells["VendorName"].Value = dtPO.Rows[0]["VendorName"];
						}
					
						dictPurchaseOrders.Add(intJobNum,(string)dtPO.Rows[0]["VendorName"]);
					}
					else
					{
						e.Row.Cells["VendorName"].Value = dictPurchaseOrders[intJobNum];
					
					}

				}
				catch
				{
					e.Row.Cells["VendorName"].Value = "error";
				}

			}

			if((string)e.Row.Cells["JobNum"].Value != "")
			{
				//MessageBox.Show("JobNum: " + ((int)e.Row.Cells["JobNum"].Value).ToString());
				//eb2:
				/*
				e.Row.Cells["PartNum2"].Value = "error";
				DataTable dtJob = _boReader.GetList("Erp:BO:JobEntry","JobNum = '" + (string)e.Row.Cells["JobNum"].Value + "'","PartNum").Tables[0];
				if(dtJob.Rows.Count > 0 )
				{
					e.Row.Cells["PartNum2"].Value = dtJob.Rows[0]["PartNum"];
				}
				*/
				try 
				{
					string strJobNum = (string)e.Row.Cells["JobNum"].Value;
					if (!dictJobs.ContainsKey(strJobNum))
					{
						dtJob = _boReader.GetList("Erp:BO:JobEntry","JobNum = '" + strJobNum + "'","PartNum").Tables[0];
						if(dtJob.Rows.Count > 0 )
						{
							e.Row.Cells["PartNum2"].Value = dtJob.Rows[0]["PartNum"];
						}
					
						dictJobs.Add(strJobNum,(string)dtJob.Rows[0]["PartNum"]);
					}
					else
					{
						e.Row.Cells["PartNum2"].Value = dictJobs[strJobNum];
					
					}

				}
				catch
				{
					e.Row.Cells["PartNum2"].Value = "error";
				}

			}

			//eb2:
			//}
			//catch
			//{}

			e.Row.Cells["RowUpdated"].Value = "YES";

		}

	}

}
